definitions.definition: used to show that two teams or sides are against each other

examples.text: It is France versus Brazil in the final.
in the case of the State versus Ford

definitions.definition: used to compare two different ideas, choices, etc.

examples.text: It was the promise of better job opportunities versus the inconvenience of moving away and leaving her friends.

wordOrigin: late Middle English: from a medieval Latin use of Latin versus ‘towards’.
